For PC users who can't wait for the update: There is a way to use files from the IPAD to partially update the PC version.
Out of this torrent take the files airports.dbf, charts.ini charts.bin (DocumentsDataTermcharts).
Rename airports.dbf to Airports.dbf and charts.bin to Charts.bin.
Copy these 3 files to your JeppesenCommonTerminalCharts folder on your pc to replace the older versions.
This will already update the terminal charts to the current version while we wait for the full Pc update.

can u tell me how to replace files to play it on pc

2joseph71   For W7 No problem sir: A). Open 1213 iP. B). From the folder "Date / TermCharts" copy 2 files, 1st "charts. bin" (size 530,081 KB). and the 2nd "charts.ini (size 1KB). C). In the first file, change the small letter " c " for a large "C ". D). Finally, these two files (" Charts. bin "and" charts.ini ") to insert with the replacement to "ProgramDate / Jeppesen / Common / TerminalCharts /.               Computer restart is not necessary.               Just enjoy it.        PS:    You can also update EnrouteData in FS.
